title: I need to speak to real Riot Support. The bots I receive in emails are not helping at all.
body: I need help recovering an account, but the robotic replies are useless and not helping.

replies.body: Without having context on your case or ticketing, I'm assuming your response has been from Blitzbot requesting you to use the recovery form instead.  We can help with recovering your account, just make sure to fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which doesn't require you to login to the ticketing system.  A member of the account team will review your case, and get back to you as soon as possible!
